title: Galicia - Booty to the new Electoral Circus of February 18
content:
In each new “feast of democracy” revisionism tries to convince the Galician proletariat that the regime Spanish is a neutral instrument, which is not the enemy of the Galician people. O revisionism tries to hide that the Spanish regime is the instrument of alliance between the Galician bourgeoisie and the Spanish bourgeoisie, in addition to other allied secondary social classes and strata, such as the clergy, from uncleshowed sectors, etc.

A political practice of revisionism always strengthens the bourgeois state because always keeps alive the idea that through the elections, the institutes and the reforms of the bourgeois state is possible, to eliminate the destructive character of capitalist society, or that it is possible to eliminate the trend for new interimperialist wars, which is possible eliminate the capitalist accumulation law that determines that the increase in wealth of a few people implies the poverty of many other people in the world, or that it is possible to regulate the maximum differences between the income of the bourgeoisie and the salary of the working class through taxes, etc.

Revisionism always tries to “save” Work Class of his “Desilusom” in the bourgeois state. Even when the revisionism calls for the “abstençom” always is because “nengumha of the options is proper". Although revisionism calls for the “abstençom”, unconsciously wants to make it clear that you don't want to consider the state bourgeois like the enemy, who does not want to fight false illusions in reform of the bourgeois state.

Other revisionists will choose the same That other times, for keeping silent over the parliamentary scam. For Many is always the "least lummy" option. A LESS MALO THAT NEVER HAS end, because there is always something worse but it is the “less malo” in the face of the new even more element.

For revisionism the elections sound o eternal process of “accumulation of forces”. An eternal “accumulation of forces ”that never ends and that only serves to“ accumulate ”the common sense of bourgeois ideology. A “accumulation of forces” that justifies everything but that does not fit nothing if we want a "guide to Açom."

In the current situation of the proletariat Galician, where there is no communist party that creates bonds that unite avant -garde and the masses, any other political position different from boycott, means renouncing bourgeois ideology. Means deviate from the fair political line. Because renouncing to get out and to denounce the class character of the state is to contribute to spreading to Bourgeois ideology. So much has revisionism to speak a lot about unionism, anti -fascism, socialism, communism, etc., because its program and your practice only serve to justify some versom Obreirista, or postmodern, from bourgeois ideology.

DRAFPAR THE CLASS CHARACTER Spanish as the political power of the Galician bourgeoisie in alliance with the Spanish and Polo bourgeoisie as much as, the main enemy of the people Galician is fundamental in the work of communist agitation. Seamless awareness of the class character of the Spanish regime it is impossible to have awareness of the social reality of the world.

BOOTING TO ELECTORAL FARDA!

Draw to the Spanish regime as the enemy of the people!
